section.p: A classification based on how the medication is marketed (e.g., prescription, over the counter drug)

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.8.19 Medication Type STATIC 1 (C83-[DE-8.19-CDA-5], C154-[DE-8.19-1])
Contains exactly one [1..1] @classCode, where its data type is ActClassObservation
Contains exactly one [1..1] @moodCode, where its data type is x_ActMoodDocumentObservation
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.8.19 Medication Type STATIC 1 (C83-[DE-8.19-CDA-5], C154-[DE-8.19-1])
